channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Idling car, 19th September
item.description:
Car idling for ages - in front of a primary school (!!) and on a day of very high air pollution.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rendlesham Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Noise from the Mosque, 19th September
item.description:
Excessive amplified sound from the Suleymaniye Mosque at 212–216 Kingsland Road. The high volume of the Imam’s broadcasts is disturbing. I do not share these religious practices and should not be forced to listen to them in my own home. Please investigate
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingsland Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No litter bin at bus stop, 19th September
item.description:
The council rubbish bin has been removed from the footway next to a bus stop at the location. As a result rubbish is accumulating and causing a health and safety issue. Also it is dangerous for the visually impaired as a trip hazard.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shooters Hill, Shooters Hill, Woolwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet
